title: Large 3 bed duplex, private yard, W/D in unit in Prospect Heights
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Text Dovid to schedule a showing at 718-926-7649

This apartment features:
Hardwood flooring
Exposed brick
Great light
Large living room
Dishwasher
Microwave
Good closet space
Private large backyard
Massive downstairs 
Laundry in unit


Must make 40x the rent and have good credit
Guarantors welcome
Contact to schedule a showing
